filmography.title: Tomorrow Is Forever
filmography.role_description: A post-war orphan adopted by a wealthy family who bonds with a mysterious, scarred chemical engineer.
filmography.plot: A man presumed dead in World War I returns home with a new face and identity to find his wife has remarried.

filmography.title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
filmography.role_description: The young daughter of a widow who moves into a seaside cottage haunted by the ghost of a sea captain.
filmography.plot: A young widow forms a unique relationship with the ghost of a seaman and writes his memoirs.

filmography.title: Miracle on 34th Street
filmography.role_description: A cynical, precocious little girl raised not to believe in fairytales who meets a man claiming to be Santa Claus.
filmography.plot: When a nice old man who claims to be Santa Claus is institutionalized as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him by arguing in court that he is the real thing.

filmography.title: Scudda Hoo! Scudda Hay!
filmography.role_description: A teenage farm girl in this rural comedy-drama involving mules and family rivalries.
filmography.plot: A young farmer buys a pair of mules and tries to win the heart of a girl while dealing with his antagonistic stepbrother.

filmography.title: Father Was a Fullback
filmography.role_description: The teenage daughter of a college football coach who is more concerned with her love life than his losing streak.
filmography.plot: A college football coach struggles with a losing team and the antics of his wife and teenage daughters.

filmography.title: The Star
filmography.role_description: The sensitive daughter of a washed-up Oscar-winning actress, played by Bette Davis, who tries to help her mother face reality.
filmography.plot: A fading movie queen, broke and unable to face reality, tries to restart her career while a former actor tries to save her from herself.

filmography.title: The Silver Chalice
filmography.role_description: A Christian slave girl who marries a Greek artisan commissioned to cast the cup of Jesus.
filmography.plot: A Greek artisan is commissioned to cast the cup of Christ in silver and hide it, but he is tempted by a magician and a dancer.

filmography.title: One Desire
filmography.role_description: An orphan adopted by a former saloon girl who causes trouble as she grows into a rebellious teenager.
filmography.plot: A saloon girl leaves her past behind to start a new life in a small town with an orphan she adopted.

filmography.title: Rebel Without a Cause
filmography.role_description: A confused, yearning teenager who finds a kindred spirit in a new boy in town, cementing her transition to adult roles.
filmography.plot: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

filmography.title: The Searchers
filmography.role_description: A young woman abducted by Comanches as a child and raised as one of them, becoming the focus of her uncle's obsessive search.
filmography.plot: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a years-long journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches after the rest of his brother's family is massacred.

filmography.title: The Burning Hills
filmography.role_description: A headstrong Mexican-American woman who helps a cowboy seeking revenge against a cattle baron.
filmography.plot: A young cowboy on the run from a cattle baron and his son is helped by a half-Mexican girl.

filmography.title: Marjorie Morningstar
filmography.role_description: A Jewish college student in the 1930s who defies her family's traditions to pursue an acting career and a bohemian romance.
filmography.plot: A young Jewish woman aspiring to be an actress falls in love with a charismatic but unstable songwriter against her parents' wishes.

filmography.title: Kings Go Forth
filmography.role_description: An American woman living in France during WWII who hides a secret about her racial heritage from the two soldiers courting her.
filmography.plot: Two American soldiers in WWII France fall for the same woman, unaware of her mixed-race background.

filmography.title: Cash McCall
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a business owner who gets involved with the corporate raider buying her father's company.
filmography.plot: A business tycoon buys failing companies to turn them around, but complicates things when he falls for the daughter of an owner.

filmography.title: All the Fine Young Cannibals
filmography.role_description: A woman who becomes pregnant by one man but marries another, leading to a complicated web of relationships and jazz clubs.
filmography.plot: Two young couples' lives intersect and unravel in the jazz world of Dallas and New York City.

filmography.title: Splendor in the Grass
filmography.role_description: A fragile high school girl in 1920s Kansas whose repressed sexuality and intense love for a boy drive her to a mental breakdown.
filmography.plot: A fragile Kansas girl's love for a handsome young man drives her to madness due to the sexual repression of her community.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actress (Drama)

filmography.title: West Side Story
filmography.role_description: A young Puerto Rican woman who falls in love with a member of a rival white gang in this musical adaptation of Romeo and Juliet.
filmography.plot: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

filmography.title: Gypsy
filmography.role_description: The shy, untalented daughter of a stage mother who transforms into the world's most famous burlesque stripper.
filmography.plot: The rise of burlesque star Gypsy Rose Lee and her complex relationship with her domineering mother, Rose.

filmography.title: Love with the Proper Stranger
filmography.role_description: A Macy's salesgirl who tracks down a one-night stand to tell him she's pregnant, leading to an unconventional romance.
filmography.plot: A young woman tracks down a musician she had a fling with to tell him she is pregnant, and they try to raise money for an abortion.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actress (Drama)

filmography.title: Sex and the Single Girl
filmography.role_description: A famous psychologist and author who becomes the target of a tabloid journalist seeking to expose her lack of experience.
filmography.plot: A tabloid editor tries to expose the author of a guide for single women, but complications ensue when they meet.

filmography.title: The Great Race
filmography.role_description: A suffragette and journalist who joins an automobile race around the world to prove women's equality.
filmography.plot: A professional daredevil and a villainous arch-rival race from New York to Paris in the early 20th century, accompanied by a female reporter.

filmography.title: Inside Daisy Clover
filmography.role_description: A tomboy turned Hollywood singing sensation in the 1930s who struggles with the pressures of stardom and a difficult family life.
filmography.plot: A teenage tomboy is discovered by a Hollywood producer and turned into a star, but the studio system threatens to destroy her.

filmography.title: This Property Is Condemned
filmography.role_description: A flirtatious small-town beauty who dreams of escaping her boarding house life and falls for a railroad official.
filmography.plot: A railroad official comes to a Mississippi town to shut down the railway yard and becomes involved with the town flirt.

filmography.title: Bob & Carol & Ted & Alice
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated Californian who, along with her husband, embraces the 'free love' movement, shocking their conservative best friends.
filmography.plot: Two couples examine their feelings about marriage, fidelity, and friendship amidst the sexual revolution of the late 1960s.

filmography.title: Brainstorm
filmography.role_description: A brilliant designer of a sensory recording device who fights to keep the technology from being weaponized; Wood's final film.
filmography.plot: Researchers develop a system that can record and playback human sensory experiences, but the military tries to take control of it.
